column1: 6480=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordB001Desc="Granted to the Blade of Ch'thon for his unwavering service."

column2: sanctified in the blood of Ch'thon."

column1: 6497=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordC002Desc="The blade's edge reeks of rot and corruption."
6500=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordC004Desc="The twisted edge of madness drives all it touches insane."
6504=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordC007Desc="Delicately balanced by generations of master swordsmen."

column2: the Magistrate of Malmouth employed alternate means of negotiation."

column1: 6512=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordC013Desc="A small vial of poison is embedded in the blade
column2: inducing stiffening paralysis and eventual death."

column1: 6516=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordC016Desc="The edge of this blade never dulls."
6520=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordD001Desc="The weapon fills its bearer with an unquenchable thirst for blood."
6522=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordD002Desc="A Soladrin crystal blade teeming with untapped power."

column2: Reforged
reforged at last as a mighty blade."

column1: 6529=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordD007Desc="You can sense your own mortality when looking upon this blade."
6531=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordD008Desc="The mere sight of this blade fills you with hope."
6534=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordD010Desc="There are letters etched into the hilt: D.T."
6537=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponSwordD012Desc="Separated from her brood and trapped beneath the fortress walls
column2: the dermapteran queen was slowly driven mad."

column1: 6559=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponBluntB001Desc="It is unclear how many innocent men lost their lives at the mercy of this weapon."
6576=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponBluntC002Desc="This once holy scepter has been twisted into its current form after being anointed with the living blood of Ch'thon."
6578=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponBluntC003Desc="A despicable weapon that has claimed countless human lives."
6583=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponBluntC007Desc="The burning hammer of the Guardians of Menhir."
6586=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponBluntC009Desc="The embodiment of the adaptability of mankind."

column2: used to pass divine judgement upon the unworthy."
forged by a long-dead people."

column1: 6639=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponAxeC006Desc="A cruel weapon owned by a cruel man."
6644=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponAxeC010Desc="The edge of this weapon harnesses the Aether itself."
6649=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponAxeC013Desc="A shamanistic axe comprising of various unidentifiable human and animal bones."
6654=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponAxeD001Desc="Embodiment of the madness and depravity that overwhelmed the people of Cairn following the Grim Dawn."

column2: thought destroyed during the Sacred Purge."
when beseeched by the gods
column3: cleaved Mount Menhir in two
column4: forming Menhir's Twins."

column1: 6686=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun1hC001Desc="Taken from the cold dead hands of the Blackwater bandit."
6688=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun1hC002Desc="Infused with dark magic to battle foul abusers of the arcane on their own terms."
6690=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun1hC003Desc="The old priest wasn't known for his peace talks."
6696=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun1hC007Desc="Inscribed on the barrel is a single word: Loyal."

column2: used during her purge of the heretical witch god worshippers."
eviscerate
column3: annihilate."

column1: 6720=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun1hD005Desc="Crafted to the exact specifications of Master Agrivix
column2: Grand Arcanist of the Silver Tower."
one kill"

column1: 6760=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun2hC005Desc="Every bullet is destined to meet its true mark
column2: regardless of who stands in its way."

column1: 6764=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun2hC007Desc="A scrapped-together weapon designed to destroy Aetherials."
6774=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun2hD002Desc="Weapon blessed by the witch gods and gifted to their followers in order to defend their sanctuaries from the wrath of the inquisition."
6776=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun2hD003Desc="The barrel spews forth the fury of the seven hells."
6778=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponGun2hD004Desc="Every shot fired sends ripples through the aether."

column2: its inventor was slain before it could be taken to mass production."

column1: 6799=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCrossbow2hC003Desc="An ill-fated weapon with too many past owners to speak of."
6801=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCrossbow2hC004Desc="Crafted using wood from the forest outside Blackwood Manor."
6807=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCrossbow2hC008Desc="Symbolic weapon of devout followers of Bysmiel."

column2: yet surprisingly effective
column3: weapon of the mountain wilds."

column2: the arcanist-turned assassin."

column1: 6816=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCrossbow2hD001Desc="The weapon of choice for Demon Hunter Edith the Bloodied
column2: Chthonian cultist turned demonslayer."

column1: 6818=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCrossbow2hD002Desc="Infused with the very essence of the witch god Dreeg."
6820=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCrossbow2hD003Desc="The great wyrm freezes all that it touches before devouring it whole."
6857=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hC003Desc="Earned its name for the countless abomination skulls it split in two."
6862=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hC006Desc="A rare success in the experimentation of arcane forging techniques."
6868=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hC010Desc="A historic weapon from the rebellion of Farmstead
column2: mercilessly crushed by Imperial forces."

column1: 6872=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hC013Desc="Forged using ancient techniques now lost to the ages."

column2: the Blood Drinker."

column1: 6876=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hC015Desc="Great hammer of Brother Bernard Mellington of the Templar."
6889=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hD003Desc="Unorthodox tool of Master of Assassins Belanor. Few Nightblades had ever mastered the art of the greatsword as he had."
6891=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hD004Desc="Forged within the molten depths of a living volcano."
6893=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponMelee2hD005Desc="Birthed when the blessed spear of Paladin Allister Forgebearer met with the heart of a greater demon."

column2: this weapon is primed to unleash nature's fury."
ruler of the northern reaches and son of the great white wolf."
always hungry for more power."

column1: 6950=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hC007_Desc="It is said that this blade cuts deeper than just the flesh."
6952=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hC008_Desc="Implement favored by the Cortosian Masters during arcane invocations."
6958=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hC013_Desc="Forged from the heart of a fallen star."

6960=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hC014_Desc="Nera'Val was a medical practitioner obsessed with curing a deadly wasting disease. He infected and killed dozens of innocents in his mad pursuit and was hanged for his crimes."
6963=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hC016_Desc="Weaves the aether through reality as a needle threads cloth."
6971=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hC023_Desc="Strange whispers in a language you cannot comprehend emanate from the scepter."
6974=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hD001Desc="Ancient folklore spoke of a cloaked figure that traveled the world cleansing disease and mending wounds
column2: never once asking for payment or any other sign of gratitude."

column1: 6981=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hD006Desc="The implement once belonging to Master Panetti
column2: master of spell replication and creator of the Replicating Missile."

column1: 6984=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hD008Desc="The blade steals heat from the air
column2: like a chilling mountain wind."

column1: 6988=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWeaponCaster1hD011Desc="Time itself warps around this dagger's edge."

column2: Van Aldritch condemned an entire city to the Grim Dawn."

column1: 7039=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldB001Desc="Forged from hardened steel and ruthless hatred."
7056=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldC002Desc="Forged by necromantic ritual as a bulwark against vile spirits."
7062=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldC007Desc="Carried by the Black Legion of the Imperial army
column2: also known as the Death's Bannermen."

column1: 7065=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldC009Desc="Forged from the purest shard of soladrin crystal."
7070=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldC013Desc="Forged by arcane smiths to channel the raw forces of the elements."
7072=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldC014Desc="Overlapping layers of chitin from the slain Dermapteran Queen."
7079=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldD001Desc="Necromantic shield molded from the chest cavity of an unfortunate peasant."
7081=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShieldD002Desc="Forged by railyard workers during a desparate battle against the rising Chthonian forces."

column2: this shield has passed through Aetherfire to become a paragon of mankind."

column1: 7129=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusB001Desc="Filled with fiery invocations to consecrate the nonbelievers."
7131=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusB002Desc="Words within this tome chill your heart with their maddening hatred."
7144=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusB011_Desc="Ancient Groble proverb: two shrunken heads better than one."
7157=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusB023_Desc="The eye still twitches in your hands."
7166=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusC006Desc="Wails of misery emanate from this tome with every page turn."

column2: condemned necromancer."

column1: 7172=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusC010Desc="Scripture once carried by the devout knights of Menhir."
7185=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusD003Desc="Forbidden texts of the witch god Solael
column2: as recorded by Cabalist Hester Maughan."

column1: 7187=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusD004Desc="This book contains the names of every mortal that ever was and ever will be."
7189=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusD005Desc="Fanatical cabalists swear that a drop of their primordial god's blood is contained within this orb."
7191=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusD006Desc="A compilation of poems and religious texts intended for burial rites."

column2: a once powerful occultist
column3: condemned for his knowledge and burnt at the stake during a public proceeding that saw him tried and executed within the hour at the behest of an angry mob."

column1: 7199=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFocusD012Desc="The Grand Arcanist Agrivix was famous for pouring inordinate quantities of energy into his spellwork
column2: but this hunger for power took him down a path of destruction that had him convinced he was the rightful ruler of the world. Agrivix ultimately met his end at the hands of inquisitors
column3: but not before taking several of them down with him."

column1: 7357=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTransmuteConfirmation=Are you sure you want to apply this Transmogrification?
7358=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTransmuteOverwrite=Are you sure you want to replace the existing Transmogrification?
7359=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTransmuteSoulboundConfirmation=Are you sure you want to apply this Transmogrification? Doing so will make the item soulbound.
7360=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTransmuteSoulboundOverwrite=Are you sure you want to replace the existing Transmogrification? Doing so will make the item soulbound.
7361=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTransmuteDestroy=Are you sure you want to infuse this Transmogrification? Doing so will destroy the item.
7362=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTransmuteRemove=Are you sure you want to remove this Transmogrification?
7396=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadB015Desc="Powerful necrotic energies caused this crown to manifest in the physical realm."
7398=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadB016Desc="A notch on the helm for every Taken he's killed."
7403=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadC003Desc="Once worn by the first and only Arcanist king of Cairn
column2: King Samuel Drake
column3: before he was stripped of his title and executed for heresy by the clergy."

column1: 7406=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagheadC005Desc="An initiate's helm for the Guardians of Menhir."
7412=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadC010Desc="A gazer eye worn by a mad witch obsessed with appearances and beauty."
7417=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadC014Desc="Cut from the hide of an ancient Thorned Horror."

column2: as if you were staring into another realm."
for your hour has struck."

column1: 7445=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagheadD003Desc="Whispers dark secrets into the ears of your victims prior to the killing blow."
7447=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagheadD004Desc="Bound by death to a death unbound."

column2: ruler of the northern reaches and son of the great white wolf."

column1: 7467=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadD022Desc="The helm whispers to you in voices you cannot comprehend."
7469=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadD023Desc="Empowered with the essence of the three Witch Gods in a covenant binding them and their followers against mutual destruction."
7479=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHeadF001Desc="You can't help but feel as if the mask is staring back at you."
7529=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShoulderC001Desc="Stitched together from the carcass of Razorback."

column2: this shoulderguard nevertheless retains much of its protective qualities."

column1: 7536=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShoulderC006Desc="Symbolic garment of a secretive order eradicated during the reign of the Arcanist King
column2: Samuel Drake."
bestowed by the witch god Bysmiel upon her mortal followers."
like an endless weave
column3: intertwine and fray with the passing ages of man."

column1: 7558=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShoulderD002Desc="Pauldrons bestowed upon masters of the Templar order who have gone beyond their mortal duties to become Exemplars."
7562=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShoulderD005Desc="The markings on these pauldrons are as if from another era."
7578=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagShoulderD020Desc="The mantle worn by the avatar of Mogdrogen himself."
7656=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoC011Desc="It is unknown as to how many victims it took to sew together these foul robes."
7660=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoC014Desc="Priest's robes once worn by members of the Weeping Eye cabal."
7663=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoC016Desc="Chthonian robes worn only by elite members of the bloodthirsty cult."
7670=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoC022Desc="Armor commissioned by the famed battle master
column2: Zolhan."

column1: 7685=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoD003Desc="The strange cloth shimmers and fades with the light
column2: creating a mesmerizing illusion around the wearer."

column1: 7687=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoD004Desc="Robes of the high priest of Dreeg
column2: charged with safeguarding the witch god's earthly concerns."

column1: 7689=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoD005Desc="Azragor was a brutal man feared amongst his fellow knights for his underhanded
column2: yet undisputable tactics."

column1: 7691=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoD006Desc="Korvoran was a legendary nightblade reknown for his deadly accuracy with throwing knives
column2: which he was able to procure even when his belt was seemingly devoid of blades."

column1: 7694=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagTorsoD008Desc="Armor bestowed upon masters of the Templar order who have gone beyond their mortal duties to become Exemplars."
7767=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWaistC002Desc="Worked wonders for Frizzick until it ran out of zombie repellant."

column2: but at equal cost in blood."

column1: 7798=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWaistD005Desc="Once worn by an eccentric mass murderer convinced that wearing the entrails of his victims would in turn protect his own."

column2: somehow contained within a single belt."
a selective group within the Templar of Menhir."

column1: 7810=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagWaistD014Desc="Woven using thread spun from the souls of the damned through unspeakable necromantic techniques."
7855=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHandsC009Desc="Engraved upon the steel are powerful symbols of immortality."

column2: for in the darkness you are invincible."

column1: 7872=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHandsD001Desc="Gloves blessed with the ferocity of Oleron himself."
7875=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHandsD003Desc="Forged over the smoldering corpse of a Chthonian harbinger."
7877=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagHandsD004Desc="Channeling necromancer's gloves that still retain some of the mage's grisly power."
7911=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagLegsC005Desc="The previous owner seems to have left a little surprise in the seat of these trousers."
7916=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagLegsC009Desc="The origins of some objects are best left to the annals of history."
7925=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagLegsD001Desc="The real challenge in the creation of this armor came in acquiring the necessary parts."
7929=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagLegsD004Desc="Forged in the fiery breath of a hellhound."
7931=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagLegsD005Desc="Dozens of incantations and words of power were whispered into the threads which now form these leggings."
7938=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagLegsD011Desc="Barbaros was a legendary fighter in the ranks of the Black Legion who met his end on the field of battle
column2: surrounded by dozens of mangled corpses of both men and horses."
they're just ok."

column1: 7961=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFeetC003Desc="These boots appear to be of a make and material unlike any of this world."
7967=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFeetC007Desc="Each step bears the weight of a thousand soldiers who lost their lives to Chthonian Forces."

column2: but they make great boots."
leave nought but a trail of desecration."

column1: 7980=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFeetD002Desc="Acquiring Wyrmscale is so dangerous few can manage to even afford a scrap
column2: nevermind an actual piece of armor. These boots were likely a status symbol for a wealthy noble."

column1: 7982=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFeetD003Desc="The spines drip with the venom of several different species of spider and snake."
7985=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFeetD005Desc="Built with a heavy sole to maximize the sickening crunch of snapping bones."
7991=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagFeetD010Desc=The very earth boils and cracks beneath these boots."
8020=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingB001Desc="A worn out inscription along the band says: With love - Amelia"
8022=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingB002Desc="Stained with the blood of his victims
column2: now joined by his own."

column1: 8024=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingB003Desc="Likely the most valuable item the family had ever owned."
8028=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingB005Desc="The gem within shimmers during summoning rituals."
8030=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingB006Desc="A crudely fashioned piece of jewelry. Strange that a slith would use such a thing."
8038=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingC006Desc="Cast from the burning remains of a fallen star."
8041=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRingC008Desc="A ring commonly carried by nobles possessed by Aetherial spirits."

column1: 10926=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagSkillClassDescription01=Soldiers of the imperial army were trained to survive in the most hellish conditions and hold the line against the deadliest enemies of the empire. Soldiers prefer the use of close combat weaponry
column2: such as a sword and shield
column3: but can also prove formidable with firearms. What a Soldier may lack in outright damage output is made up for in fortitude and leadership.

column2: Demolitionists are part engineer and part sorcerer. They were used to break enemy ranks and breach fortifications with their devastating array of explosives and destructive magic. They usually prefer to fight at range; engaging enemies with guns
column3: traps and explosives but they can also be proficient with melee weapons.

column1: 10930=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagSkillClassDescription03=Once hunted by imperial forces in an effort to control eldritch power
column2: the Occultist's craft focuses heavily on summoning and borrowed powers granted by the three witch "gods" Bysmiel
column3: Solael and Dreeg. Their diverse arts include abhorrent curses and spells that inflict damage with poison
column4: acid
column5: and entropic energy. Excelling with neither sword nor gun
column6: they can use either to augment their offense.

column1: 10932=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagSkillClassDescription04=Nightblades were clandestine warriors that sold their services to the great houses of the empire. Nightblades excel with all manner of martial weapons
column2: but are even more feared for the deadly blade magic that is the secret of their trade. Nightblades are not suited to go toe to toe with tougher enemies and rely on illusion to close for quick
column3: devastating attacks or fight from a distance with phantasmal blades.

column2: the manifestation of magic is not some unexplainable mystery or the will of the gods
column3: but a science meant to be unraveled.  This pursuit of knowledge drives all Arcanists
column4: always eager to discover a new technique to make their namesake.  Arcanists warp Aetherial and elemental energy to their will
column5: creating devastating demonstrations of power that rival small armies.  However
column6: such raw force leaves little in terms of defense.

column2: Shamans were the spiritual leaders and guardians of their people. Claiming an astounding attunement to the wilds and their patron deity Mogdrogen
column3: Shamans are capable of wielding the terrible forces of nature against their foes or even calling upon savage beasts to come to their aid. Shamans excel in the use of brutal two-handed melee weapons
column4: but can easily adapt to other tools of war when conjuring their primal powers.

column1: 10963=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription00A=Intense physical conditioning necessary to brave the harsh reality of Cairn.
10966=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription01A=The use of weapon forms in combat gives your attacks a natural cadence with peaks and ebbs that
column2: while predictable
column3: are none the less effective and difficult to counter.  ^oWhen used as your default weapon attack
column4: Cadence will magnify the power of every 3rd single weapon strike.

column1: 10968=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription01B=The fury of Cadence resonates with the target
column2: causing heavy bleeding and striking additional nearby targets. ^oWith ranged weapons
column3: Cadence has a chance to pierce through enemies.

column1: 10970=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription01C=You push the advantage following a Cadence strike
column2: briefly causing all of your blows to strike with additional deadly force. ^oDeadly Momentum affects all attacks while active.

column1: 10972=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription01D=The discord of a wrathful soul flows into the Soldier's pure fighting cadence and sows it with elemental energy.
10975=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription02A=Such force is channeled into the attack that it compresses the very air
column2: projecting out a wave of energy that stuns and damages foes. ^oThis attack requires a shield or two-handed melee weapon.
making them more susceptible to physical attacks.
causing profuse internal and external bleeding.

smash the ground with a mighty two-hander and let rip devastating waves of energy upon your foes. ^oThis technique requires a two-handed melee weapon. Tremor is not a default weapon attack enhancer and cannot trigger effects such as Markovian's Advantage.

column2: taking your enemies by surprise. ^oRequires a melee weapon. When used with a shield

column1: 10986=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription03B=The suddenness and ferocity of your attack puts enemies off-balance
column2: reducing their combat prowess.

column1: 10989=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription04A=A blood-chilling war cry weakens the resolve of your foes and disrupts their focus.
10991=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription04C=Less resolute foes will flee at the sound of your fearsome challenge.

column2: rendering them powerless against you.

10998=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription05B=Expert technique causes Blade Arc to strike more enemies and to tear them open
column2: causing bleeding.

column1: 11000=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription05C=A more powerful form of Blade Arc in which the Soldier builds power between attacks to unleash it in one focused burst of intense damage that can knock foes to the ground.
11003=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription06A=The renowned tactician Markovian always maneuvered to strike from the higher ground.  This classic attack
column2: inspired by Markovian's battlefield tactics
column3: features a powerful downward strike to throw enemies off balance
column4: weakening their defenses. ^oCan activate with all default weapon attacks.

column2: this attack uses a low center of mass and powerful swing to imbalance your opponents. ^oCan activate with all default weapon attacks. When used with a melee weapon
column3: the attack strikes multiple nearby targets.

column2: the sting of enemy blows rouses your anger instead
column3: adding extra force to your attacks.

column2: the unyielding will of Menhir fills you with renewed strength. ^oRequires a shield or two-handed melee weapon.

column1: 11013=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription09A=A superior sense of discipline and knowledge of battlefield tactics makes you a natural leader in the heat of battle. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.
11015=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription09B=Inspires your allies to perform to the very best of their abilities.
11018=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription10A=Heavily regimented military training strengthens and fortifies the body against the hardships of war.
11020=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription11A=Experience in some of the toughest theatres of the colonial wars has given you the ability to survive ordeals that would be fatal to others.
11022=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription12A=An ability to remain calm and think clearly in the heat of battle enables veterans to more easily spot the gaps in an enemy's defense
column2: or predict the flow of their attacks so that they can be easily countered.
Menhir. Menhir is an ancient aspect that blesses his followers with the tenacity of the very earth. ^oRequires a shield. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.
Oleron. Oleron is an ancient aspect that inspires unwavering ferocity in his followers. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11031=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription15A=Assume a defensive stance that greatly boosts your combat awareness. You can only maintain this focus for a short duration. ^oRequires a shield.

column2: you have seen the worst that battle has to offer. The horrors of war no longer hinder your actions
column3: and neither does a little spilled blood.

column1: 11037=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription17=Enter a state of intense readiness in order to unleash lightning-fast counter strikes against your attackers. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

11040=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass01SkillDescription18=Extensive study of shield combat techniques provides improved handling and expert maneuverability; ensuring that your shield is never a hindrance
column2: even when on the offensive. ^oRequires a shield.

column1: 11047=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription00A=Expertise in the combination of science and sorcery to unleash fiery hell upon the battlefield.

11050=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription01A=The grenado is a recent invention that has quickly grown in use on the battlefield where it has evened the playing field between sorcerous manipulation and conventional weaponry.
11052=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription01B=An improved design on the standard Grenado causes it to explode with intense heat and dangerously sharp shrapnel.
11054=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription01C=When just exploding an enemy is not enough
column2: this alchemical alteration to Grenado's chemistry unleashes a maelstrom of electricity upon detonation.

column1: 11056=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription01D=The intense blastwave created by the Grenado explosion ripples through your foes
column2: inflicting grievous internal harm.

column1: 11059=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription02A=A blinding light temporarily confuses enemies and disrupts their ability to defend themselves.
11061=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription02B=After-images burnt into enemy's retina reduce their ability to land attacks.
11064=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription03A=A deadly alchemical technique causes martial attacks to combust the air around the enemy. ^oWhen used as your default weapon attack
column2: Fire Strike inflicts additional damage.

column1: 11066=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription03B=Increases the potency of Fire Strike with an explosive charge that inflicts additional harm upon nearby foes.
11068=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription03C=Further alchemical alterations cause Fire Strike to electrocute the target with a chance of knocking them off their feet.

11070=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription03D=Pyromancy with a hint of the occult imbues Fire Strike with the chaotic power of brimstone. ^oRanged attacks will also splinter into molten fragments.
11072=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription03E=Focusing the destructive power of Fire Strike allows it to hit with greater intensity while requiring less energy
column2: but this technique can only be achieved with the proper handling of one-handed melee weapons. ^oRequires a one-handed melee weapon.

column1: 11074=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription03F=When channeled through a mighty two-handed melee or ranged weapon
column2: Fire Strike inflicts devastating harm. ^oRequires a two-handed melee or two-handed ranged weapon.
this devilish contraption is capable of laying waste to an entire field of enemies.

column1: 11079=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription04B=An adjustment to the Canister Bomb's casing improves its concussive power
column2: inflicting immense trauma in a larger blast radius.
the Concussive Bomb does a little less damage but will leave foes shell-shocked.

column1: 11084=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription05A=Places a mortar that will continuously lob explosives into the air until depleted. ^oThe trap scales with player damage bonuses.
11086=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription05B=Potent sorcery increases the damage output of mortar shells and infuses them with electrical damage.
11088=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription05C=Loads the Mortar Trap with a devastating bomb known only as "The Big One"
column2: which will fire towards the beginning of the trap's barrage. The resulting colossal explosion will leave your enemies shellshocked
column3: if they survive at all.

column1: 11092=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription05E=Launches an electrically charged mortar at enemies.

11095=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription06A=Drops a trio of small but deadly pyrotechnic charges that will sear enemies with intense jets of flame. ^oThe mines scale with player damage bonuses.

column2: half alchemy
column3: this lethal improvement to the Thermite Mine causes it to scorch enemies with unearthly flame that sears the very being.

column1: 11099=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription06C=Emits a deadly jet of white-hot flame to incinerate enemies that pass over it.

11103=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription07A=A combination of military gear and pyromancy creates a ward capable of deflecting a fixed amount of all incoming damage while reducing pierce and fire damage. Attacking enemies will suffer the fiery blowback from the shield.
11105=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription07B=Those who have sacrificed much in the pursuit of pyrotechnics eventually come to be favored by Ulzuin
column2: receiving his blessing in wreaking fiery devastation upon the world. ^o[Affects Stun Jacks
column3: Grenado and Canister Bomb and requires one to unlock]

column1: 11108=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription08A=Blackwater Cocktails were concocted when more conventional explosives ran low. These improvised fire bombs leave a self-fueled blaze upon impact and are particularly effective against tightly packed enemies.
11110=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription08B=Sorcerous enchantment imbues the flames with chaotic power that melts enemy flesh and deteriorates armor.
11112=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription08C=Intensifies the fire and hellflame to degrees that will render your enemies to ashes.
11114=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription08D=This more potent formulation burns longer and degrades your foes ability to fight.

column2: electrically charged jacks that will temporarily stop enemies in their tracks.

column1: 11119=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription09B=Boosts the electrical capacity of each stun jack and increases the number of jacks that can be thrown at once.

11121=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription09C=They lose the stopping power of Stun Jacks but can be thrown in rapid succession to spread devastating electrical damage among large packs of foes.

column2: as many Demolitionists eventually do
column3: to dabble in the sorcerous arts of pyromancy unlocks the ability to imbue yourself and nearby allies with a living flame that augments attacks and retaliates at enemies. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11126=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription12B=Delving deeper into the secrets of pyromancy grants such refined control over fire that it can be used to temper the weapons and armor of allies beyond conventional means and to imbue them with a living flame.
11129=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription13A=Ulzuin's eternal flame once brought life and healing to the world
column2: but betrayal and torment twisted this gift into a weapon of vengeance. Those sworn to Ulzuin receive vigor in battle and fiery retaliation upon their foes. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11131=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription13B=As the flame of Ulzuin scorches adjacent enemies
column2: bolts of sorcerous flame and electricity will arc out to strike more distant foes.

column1: 11134=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription10A=Lobs a powerful electrically charged bomb at enemies. Effective against tough single targets.
11136=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription10B=Increases the electrical damage of Lightning Charge.
11138=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription11A=Increases the firepower of Grenado and Canister Bomb.
11140=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass02SkillDescription14A=A powerful attack that does increased damage and knocks down most small to mid-sized enemies.
11147=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription00=An in-depth study on the manipulation and control of the occult.

11150=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription01A=Summon a mythical storm raven to support you. Storm ravens are eldritch creatures of uncanny intelligence and magical ability quite different from mundane ravens. Some believe they are not birds at all but rather some manner of ancient sky spirit for which the raven is a preferred manifestation. ^oOnly one raven may be summoned at any one time. The raven scales with Pet Bonuses.
11154=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription01C=The raven channels eldritch energies to mend the flesh of wounded allies.
11156=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription01D=The raven projects its eldritch spirit into selected allies
column2: empowering them beyond their mortal means.

column1: 11158=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription01E=The storm raven calls forth a powerful lightning bolt to electrocute nearby foes.

11161=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription02A=Calls forth a hellhound from the eldritch realms to savage the Occultist's enemies. This vicious beast will battle alongside you until its life is extinguished in a blazing inferno. ^oOnly one hellhound can be summoned at any one time. The hellhound scales with Pet Bonuses.
11163=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription02B=Brimstone claws tear an arc of flame through enemies within the hellhound's reach.
11165=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription02C=An aura of hellfire surrounds the hellhound
column2: augmenting it with power from its natural realm and searing enemies that strike its flesh. This power extends to nearby allies.
incinerating your enemies.

column1: 11171=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription02F=The Hellhound's flesh erupts as it returns to its natural realm
column2: incinerating nearby enemies.

column1: 11174=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription03A=Strengthens the bonds of control with your minions causing them to fight with greater vigor and determination.
11176=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription03B=Subtle manipulation of the bonds of control beguiles minions into feeling overwhelming devotion towards you
column2: causing them to fight with fanatical strength and speed.

column1: 11179=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription04A=A binding with the great guardian confers some of Dreeg's regenerative ability
column2: while wounds inflicted by enemies will spray caustic blood as though inflicted upon Dreeg himself. ^oThis effect is also applied to nearby allies.

column1: 11181=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription04B=Deepening the connection to Dreeg causes enemy attacks on the occultist to impact as though they were striking the quilled scales of the guardian.
11183=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription04C=Sacrifice all of your regenerative power to enhance the caustic potential of Dreeg's blood.

column2: burning your enemies with entropic energy with every weapon attack. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11188=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription05B=Deepens the Occultist's bond to the hidden realm
column2: intensifying the power of witchfire such that the slightest touch burns through the life essence of foes.
turning it into a focal point for chaotic powers.

column1: 11193=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription06A=A cruel word of power that robs enemies of their fortitude
column2: making them slow and fragile.

column1: 11195=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription06B=Empowers the curse's vile potency so that it also weakens the constitution of your enemies
column2: making them more susceptible to witchcraft and poisons.

column1: 11198=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription10A=Creates an occult sigil on the ground that consumes the life-force of enemies caught within its power
column2: returning a portion of the damage dealt as health to the Occultist.

column1: 11200=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription10B=Imbues the sigil with the destructive powers of chaos itself.
11203=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription11A=Summons one of the infinite eyes of Dreeg
column2: the great guardian of the hidden realm. The eye quickly speeds toward the target and then detonates itself.
showering nearby enemies with vitriolic gore.

column1: 11207=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription11C=The frightful gaze of the eldritch and immortal Dreeg may cause enemies to stand frozen in fear or simply run in fruitless terror.
11209=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription11D=Putrid chunks burst forth from the eye upon impact
column2: inflicting further pain upon any foes unfortunate enough to be close to its detonation.

column1: 11211=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription11E=Channel the foul powers of Dreeg into each Eye
column2: causing it to burst with greater intensity and harm
column3: but also requiring a longer pause between casts.

column1: 11214=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription12A=You allow your body to act as a mortal vessel for the witch god Solael. The spirit of Solael radiates through your body
column2: fortifying you against attacks as it magnifies your occult power. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11217=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription13A=Shunned even by many Occultists for the prolonged suffering it inflicts
column2: this abhorrent curse calls down a virulent plague to spread amongst foes
column3: inexorably sapping their life-force and causing them to bleed from every orifice.

column1: 11219=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription13B=Causes Pox to destroy your foe's vitality and turn weeping sores into gouts of blood. Such insidious spell-craft has earned Occultists their dark repute and seen many burnt at the stake.
11221=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription13C=Burning with fever and suffering the liquefaction of their internal organs
column2: the infected may be hit by sudden bouts of confusion and wander the battlefield attacking the air or even their own allies.

column1: 11223=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription13D=This transmutation of Pox can be as dangerous to the Occultist as to the foe. The plague will progress rapidly
column2: more than doubling its damage
column3: but as the afflicted burn with fever
column4: they will become crazed
column5: moving with unnatural speed and attacking with berserker fury that makes them both more deadly and more vulnerable.

column1: 11226=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription14A=A bolt of entropic power tears through the fabric of reality to inflict massive damage on any foe it strikes.
11230=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription07A=Nullifies enemy enchantments and inflicts energy-burn damage based on the ammount of the enemy's remaining energy.
11232=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription08A=Sends out a swarm of entropic energy that tears into the very material of your enemy's being.
11234=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription08B=Magnifies chaos damage while also burning a portion of the target's energy
column2: inflicting additional energy burn damage.

column1: 11236=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass03SkillDescription09A=Creates a magical circle around the caster that regenerates life and repels those with evil intention.

column2: healing sanctuary where they are unable to move but shielded against all harm.

column1: 11245=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription00=Practice in the arts of illusion and whirling blades.
11248=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription01A=A legendary technique of the Nightblades. Hurl conjured blades infused with shadow magic that rend through flesh like paper.

column2: Phantasmal Blades are conjured so sharp that they can pierce through multiple targets while invisible phantasmal threads draw vitality from the victims.

column1: 11252=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription01C=Empowers the Phantom Blade with dark magic
column2: a loathsome technique used only in the most dire circumstances.
that compounds the lethality of the phantasmal blades in a single vicious strike.

column1: 11256=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription01D=Dispense continuous volleys of phantasmal blades with frenetic speed but less killing power per blade.

11259=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription02A=A cunning combination of illusion and mental deflection allows you to seemingly vanish and reappear above your victim like a nightmarish specter. ^oRequires a melee weapon.

column2: found unsavory by most Nightblades
column3: Nidalla maintained that the ends justified the means. This toxic twist on the traditional Shadow Strike will ensure the end of any foe that survives the initial attack.

column1: 11263=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription02C=As you reappear and engage your prime target
column2: a pall of darkness will descend upon surrounding enemies like the darkest
column3: coldest night
column4: chilling their blood and invading their minds with an uncontrollable weariness.

column2: Belgothian was rumored to lack fine control of his conjuring; but he had the unremitting willpower to summon so many blades that they would form an impenetrable shield surrounding him
column3: giving him a moment of respite from his foes. ^oThis skill immobilizes you for its duration.

column2: hundreds of phantasmal blades encircle you at lethal speed
column3: cutting down adjacent foes.

column1: 11271=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription04B=Vicious phantasmal blades slice deep into foes caught within the ring
column2: spilling copious amounts of blood.

column1: 11273=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription04C=A powerful pneumatic technique causes the ring of steel to draw energy from the nearby air
column2: magnifying cold damage and freezing foes but at the cost of piercing damage.

column1: 11276=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription05A=Among the most fundamental skills of the Nightblade are the mastery of melee dual wielding
column2: favoring the use of piercing blades
column3: and the art of drawing elemental cold from iron and steel. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding bonus. Also enables the ability to dual wield melee weapons.

column1: 11278=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription05B=The brawny Belgothian was an anomaly among the lithe Nightblade masters
column2: but he exceeded them all in raw power. Leveraging his strength in direct but lethal attacks like the shears
column3: Belgothian could often finish an enemy in a single move. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding technique that activates off of default weapon attacks.

column2: Amarasta's blades were said to sound like a whip through the air
column3: leaving only streaks of light too fast for the eye to follow. Masters of this technique can strike thrice in the space of a normal attack. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding technique that activates off of default weapon attacks.

column1: 11282=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription05D=A devastating technique intended for multi-target combat. Those that survive are left bleeding as if from a thousand cuts. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding technique that activates off of default weapon attacks.

11284=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription05E=The controversial Nightblade master Nidalla demonstrated the cruel effectiveness of poisons during the Age of Unreason when she combined the foul toxins with other nightblade techniques
column2: allowing her to prevail in battle against greatly superior numbers. ^oThis technique modifies Belgothian's Shears
column3: Amarasta's Quick Cut and Whirling Death.

column2: struck during a moment of opportunity
column3: with the intent to quickly finish a foe. Those that survive are not likely to remain alive for very long. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding technique that activates off of default weapon attacks.

column1: 11289=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription06A=Secret martial techniques of the Nightblades enable you to draw vital breath or "pneuma" from your surroundings for short bursts of speed and power. The metabolic acceleration caused by these vital breaths also confers minor healing.

11291=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription06B=Practice in combat meditation allows you to achieve a calm clarity in the heat of battle where you can calculate the path of enemy attacks and shift subtly to lessen the impact of weapon hits on your armor or to deflect projectiles.
11293=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription06C=Adept Nightblades can pull energy from the air or even foes their weapons come in contact with to deliver attacks of intense cold.
11295=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription06D=Overly muscled and slow by Nightblade standards
column2: part of Belgothian's success was attributed to his ability to recover health and outlast opponents through a profound mastery of the pneuma breathing technique. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding technique. Also enables the ability to dual wield melee weapons.

column1: 11298=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription07A=A psionic veil clouds the minds of nearby enemies
column2: slowing their movements and diminishing their effectiveness in combat. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11300=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription07B=Causes foes affected by the Veil of Shadow to feel the dark chill of the night fall over them
column2: sapping their life and weakening their defenses.

column1: 11303=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription08A=Conjure a swirling cloud of lethal blades that will roam the battlefield
column2: slicing enemies to pieces before finally expiring in a shower of jagged shards. ^oBlade Spirits scale with player damage bonuses.

column1: 11306=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription08PetB=The Blade Spirit shoots out eviscerating blades in all directions.
11309=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription11A=Your command of Nightblade techniques allows you to entrap enemies within a prison of deadly phantasmal blades.
11311=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription11B=The phantasmal blades drain the life essence of the foes trapped within their grasp
column2: transferring it to you.

column1: 11314=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription10A=Conjure a swarm of phantasmal blades to envelop your foes
column2: lacerating their flesh and driving the weak of heart into terror.

column1: 11316=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription10B=A master technique that causes the Blade Swarm to turn the weapons of your foes against themselves
column2: causing them to inflict further suffering with their own tools of war.
brought into being through the focused power of mind and spirit. This barrier repels physical damage and transfers energy from magical attacks into your own pneuma reserves.
the extensive study of anatomy familiarizes you with all of the most vulnerable and damaging locations in which to slide a blade.
sometimes a knowledge of poisons and elemental powers can be the most effective means to gain the upper hand in combat.

column1: 11327=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription04X=Cutting away the very life-force of nearby foes
column2: you absorb some of this fleeting vitality through the Ring of Steel.

column1: 11329=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription07X=Deepening shadow further diminishes the visibility of foes
column2: impeding their defense against physical attacks.
wounds appear on enemies where no weapon was seen to strike.

column1: 11333=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription09A=This attack literally takes life from opponents and returns it to the Nightblade
column2: allowing them to grow stronger even as the life leaves their quarry.

column1: 11335=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription12A=Draw vital breathe from enemies within an area
column2: gaining life and energy as it flees their bodies.

column1: 11337=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass04SkillDescription13D=Efficient use of poisons and anti-clotting agents can sometimes be the deadliest weapon of all.

column2: legendary among the Nightblades for her alacrity
column3: developed a technique by which she would unleash a burst of deadly phantasmal blades which spread out from the point of attack to impale all adjacent foes.

column2: Amarasta would continue her relentless assault following a blade burst to quickly and decisively finish off any surviving adversaries with her imbued weapons. ^oLethal Assault affects all attacks while active.

column1: 11345=//records/davtxt.tekst=xtagClass04SkillDescription14A=A risky technique favored by the master of assassins Amarasta. Lethal Gambit has the potential to inflict devastating harm when carried off perfectly
column2: but with the risk that it may falter. ^oRequires a melee weapon or two-handed ranged weapon. When used with a melee weapon
column3: strikes additional nearby targets.

column1: 11347=//records/davtxt.tekst=xtagClass04SkillDescription14B=Mastery of the Lethal Gambit technique enhances it with a burst of dozens of deadly phantasmal blades which spread out from the point of attack to damage all adjacent foes. ^oFor ranged weapons
column2: only one projectile will trigger this effect.

column1: 11351=//records/davtxt.tekst=xtagClass04SkillDescription15A=A quick cut to the gut that will bleed out a victim over time
column2: while impairing their mobility and attack speed. ^oRequires a Sword or Axe.

column1: 11353=//records/davtxt.tekst=xtagClass04SkillDescription15B=A master technique that enhances eviscerate and has the potential to cause devastating damage if carried off perfectly but with the risk that it may falter and do little to nothing.
11355=//records/davtxt.tekst=xtagClass04SkillDescription14C=An outnumbered gunman can quickly turn the odds in their favor with clever use of a splintering round. As desperate measure
column2: this method can also prove lethal at point-blank range. ^oRequires a two-handed ranged weapon to launch additional projectiles.

column1: 11362=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription00=Conditioning of the body and mind to withstand the corrupting power of raw magic.

column2: Panetti devoted himself to advancing the classic arcane missile. His triumph is an alteration that seemingly defies the laws of conservation of energy
column3: causing the missile to be replicated on impact
column4: spawning multiple copies of itself.

column1: 11367=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription01B=Replicating Missile distorts your enemy's very being
column2: causing the projectile to sometimes completely pass through your target.

column1: 11369=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription01C=The air around the Replicating Missile becomes supercharged with static energy
column2: electrocuting any enemies unfortunate enough to come in contact with the projectile.

column1: 11371=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription01D=A more advanced technique of Replicating Missile perfected by a student of Panetti draws upon the energy of the target itself to create fragments of pure arcane energies.
11373=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription01E=Manifests the power of the Replicating Missile into the corporeal realm
column2: causing it to inflict physical as well as metaphysical harm.

column1: 11376=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription02A=Iskandra taught her students that the most efficient path of victory was to turn an opponent's own energies against them. Just so
column2: Elemental Exchange causes the weapons of allies to hungrily absorb arcane energy from foes and return it in the form of elemental damage. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect. The damage conversion only applies to the caster.

column1: 11378=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription02B=The incantation becomes overloaded with arcane forces
column2: causing your weapons to crackle with the raw powers of the elements.

column1: 11380=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription02C=Strike a finely-tuned balance within your incantation
column2: harmonizing the opposing forces of fire and ice with wild electricity.

column1: 11382=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription02D=Arcane energies manifest in many forms. Arcanists who delve into the art of summoning often transfer their mastery of the arcane to their loyal minions so that they can better serve the will of their masters. ^oThis effect is extended to your allies.

11385=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription03A=The mythical Trozan was said to be a natural; wild and unwilling to conform to the doctrines of the Imperial Arcanists. When the Imperials finally surrounded his mountaintop refuge
column2: Trozan humbled them using an unknown technique to bring down the very sky upon them. ^oDrops 3 shards upon the target area.

column1: 11387=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription03B=The ice trapped within the Sky Shard becomes released upon collision
column2: bathing those near the point of impact with a freezing chill.

column1: 11389=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription03C=The Sky Shard becomes increasingly unstable upon descent
column2: building up a dangerous amount of charge as it propels through the sky.

column1: 11392=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription04A=Master Callidor famously served as a general in King Samuel's army. While deployed on the front lines
column2: Callidor perfected a technique which
column3: by creating a sudden concentrated burst of raw aether energy
column4: would ignite the air around him in an arcane tempest.

column2: searing flesh and melting armor.

column1: 11396=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription04C=Agrivix was reknown for channeling such immense power into the Tempest that the resulting explosion would leave nothing but ashes of anyone foolish enough to stray within reach. However
column2: his technique required great concentration and could not be repeated without rest.

column1: 11399=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription05A=A rare defensive technique of arcane magic invented by the revered Arcanist Maiven. Creates a protective shield around the caster
column2: but at a great cost in concentration. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

column1: 11401=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription05B=The sphere absorbs harmful debilitating effects and converts them into your energy reserves.

11404=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription06A=A powerful arcane technique perfected by Master Albrecht in the years just preceeding the Grim Dawn that channels raw arcane energies into a concentrated beam of destruction. ^oRequires a Caster Off-Hand.
11406=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription06B=Pours all of your energy into the Aether Ray
column2: turning it into a catastrophic force that disintegrates all it touches. ^oEnergy Cost increase is per damage interval.

column1: 11408=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription06C=Corrupts the beam by instead fueling it with the raging powers of the chaotic void.
11411=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription07A=Concentrates massive amounts of negative energy within the target area
column2: purging all enemies caught within it of beneficial auras and spells while allies are purged of negative ailments
column3: including damage over time effects.

column1: 11414=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription08A=Hailed as the ultimate force of destruction known to Arcanists
column2: this technique tears a rift in reality through which fall embers of raw arcane energy. This dangerous spell is extremely draining and should not be used lightly. ^oRequires a Caster Off-Hand. Embers continue to fall over the duration of the spell. Only one Devastation can be cast at any one time.

column1: 11417=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription09A=Focusing the mind and body into a locus for arcane energies is one of the first meditative techniques taught to aspiring Arcanists.

11429=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription13A=Olexra favored the use of ice in her spellcasting. One of her tactics involved raising up a wall of volatile ice spikes to keep her foes at bay while she attacked safely from the other side.

column1: 11441=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass05SkillDescription15B=Many Arcanists sacrifice much in the pursuit of limitless power. There are some who do not heed the ancient warnings and tap into sources of power that others would consider unsafe

column1: 11473=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagClass06SkillDescription03A=Wendigo Totems represent a darker side to Shaman rituals

demigod of the shadows and lord of the night hunt. ^oYou can only summon one manifestation of Nemesis at any one time. Nemesis scales with player damage bonuses.

column1: 13213=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD004Desc=Empower your defenses and those of your allies to become a moving fortress. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.
13216=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD005Desc=Empower yourself and your allies with the power of a lightning storm. ^oThis ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.
13219=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD006Desc=A vicious reckoning upon those who strike you that leaves them vulnerable to a counterattack.
13222=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD007Desc=Strike at your enemies with a chilling blow that cuts to their very core with death's chill
column2: returning some of the stolen vitality to you. ^oRequires a melee weapon.

column1: 13225=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD008Desc=Wild flames erupt from you in a trail of devastation.
13228=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD009Desc=Invoke a debilitating curse upon your enemies
column2: causing their flesh to rot and their senses to slow.
creating swirling bursts of aether and chaos energy around you.

column1: 13234=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD011Desc=Unleash the pure destructive force of chaos upon your enemies.
13237=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD012Desc=The more carnage and devastation you cause
column2: the easier it becomes to do so once again. ^oThis is a melee dual-wielding technique. Also enables the ability to dual wield melee weapons.

column1: 13240=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD013Desc=Rip through the fragile barrier between the nether and the mortal realm as you conjure a massive burning rock to drop upon your enemies.
13243=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD014Desc=Unleash the combined energy of the blows you have sustained into a devastating shockwave.
13246=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD015Desc=The rhythmic pace of your never-ending strife calls forth a Swarmling to your aid.
13249=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD016Desc=Unleash the fury of Solael upon any who would dare strike his chosen servant.
13252=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD017Desc=Unleash a ring of Dreeg's poisonous spines upon your unsuspecting foes
column2: infecting them with the great one's blood.

column1: 13255=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD018Desc=Seeing their master injured drives your minions into a vicious frenzy.
13258=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD019Desc=Become empowered with the power of the war god's blood
column2: unleashing his wrath upon nearby enemies.

column1: 13261=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD020Desc=Become empowered with the protective spirit of Menhir
column2: shielding yourself and your allies from harm.

column1: 13264=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagRelicSkillD021Desc=Your furious arcane assault sometimes disrupts your careful balance between the elements
column2: unleashing a surge of power that will make your foes regret ever coming near you. ^oRequires a Caster Off-Hand.

column1: 13273=//records/davtxt.tekst=tagConsumableSkill_A01Desc=Fortifies the flesh against the heat of flame.
